participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and seeking change in life, yet curious about others.
participant_1.background: i am 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and nurturing, balancing new responsibilities with personal interests.
participant_2.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

content.text: Do you like to watch movies?
